dear,
       Christine...i think u should begin by asking ur parents or your relatives. i also think that u sholud meet or contact the person how using murakami names.

christinemurakami <christinemurakami@...> wrote:
I have seen the family crests that are listed..  and unfortunately 
there are two of them for the murakami family..

Ive been doing some research to find out which one belongs to my 
family..

But, I have not found out anything.. 

Is there any suggestions on how i could find out which one is my 
family's crest..  Where do I begin.. 

Thank you

Christine
